abstract: Stately restaurant Eleven Madison Park is making dramatic shift back to simplicity after several years of elaborate tasting menu courses; new menu offers fewer items, less dramatic presentation and more diner choice.

headline.print_headline: Instead of Card Tricks, Radical Simplicity
headline.main: At Eleven Madison Park, a New Minimalism

snippet: The highly acclaimed Manhattan restaurant is simplifying its tasting menu and how it is presented to diners.
lead_paragraph: The highly acclaimed Manhattan restaurant is simplifying its tasting menu and how it is presented to diners.
